chapters.title: Chapter 47: More Tales of the Wheel
chapters.info: Lain Mandragoran, p. 595—Akir's brother, Lan's uncle. He was married to Breyan. His brother and he were as close as twins, and never let even Akir's becoming king get in the way. His wife, however, was jealous of Akir, and dared her husband to march his men all the way to Shayol Ghul itself, hoping to use the inevitable defeat as cause to pull Akir off the throne. Lain died in the Blasted Lands. See also Mandragoran, Breyan; Mandragoran, Isam; Mandragoran, Lain; Mandragoran, Lan.
